description.english: Lose every burnable building of a town to fire.
description.german: Verliere jedes brennbare Gebäude einer Stadt durch Feuer.
description.french: Perdez tous les bâtiments inflammables de la carte à cause des incendies.

description.russian: Потеряй каждое способное сгореть здание на карте в результате пожара.
description.portuguese: Perder cada prédio capaz de pegar fogo no mapa.
description.schinese: 由于火灾失去了地图上所有的可燃建筑。

description.english: In a scenario, don't lose a single building to fire.
description.german: Verliere in einem Szenario kein einziges Gebäude durch Feuer.

description.portuguese: Num cenário, não perder um único prédio para o fogo.
description.schinese: 在场景中,不让火灾烧毁一座建筑。

displayName.japanese: コスマスとダミアヌス
